an3.47:1.3: Uppado pannayati, vayo pannayati, thitassa annathattam pannayati.
an3.47:1.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini sankhatassa sankhatalakkhanani”ti.
an3.47:2.3: Na uppado pannayati, na vayo pannayati, na thitassa annathattam pannayati.
an3.47:2.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini asankhatassa asankhatalakkhanani”ti.
